revised_title: John Bertram Adams: A Pioneering Career in Nuclear Research and Accelerator Development
tldr: John Bertram Adams was a renowned nuclear physicist and engineer who made significant contributions to the development of particle accelerators and fusion research. He spent much of his career at CERN, where he built and led the construction of several large accelerators. Adams also played a key role in the development of fusion research in the United Kingdom. Despite lacking formal academic qualifications, his engineering talent and skills were recognized, and he went on to have a highly successful career in the scientific community.
